com.horaz.client.util
Class RegExp.Result

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.horaz.client.util.RegExp.Result
Enclosing class:
RegExp
public static final class RegExp.Result
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Wraps the result of any RegExp operation which is either an object or an array of strings. Use the accessor methods, or use the iterator, or cast() it to JsArrayString to access the matched strings.

RegExp.Result

Method Detail

get

public java.lang.String get(int num)
Depending on the global ('g') flag this either returns a 0-indexed match or 1-indexed submatch.

Parameters:
num -
Returns:
match (0-based index) or submatch (1-based index)

index

public int index()
Returns:
The index of the match. Always 0 in global matching mode.

input

public java.lang.String input()
Returns:
The input string. Always null in global matching mode.

iterator

public RegExp.Result.IterableIterator iterator()
Returns an Iterator which is also Iterable and can be used in foreach loops. This is because JavaScriptObject cannot implement interfaces. :-(

length

public int length()
Returns:
the number of matches.

match

public java.lang.String match()
Returns:
the matched string.

toArray

public java.lang.String[] toArray()
